factText:
Investigation underway after deadly explosion shakes Houston https://t.co/uNVLXkDI2H via @nbcnews. Investigation underway after deadly explosion shakes Houston
https://t.co/J6oMAMM1qb. Houston explosion: 1 person remains "unaccounted" for, say authorities https://t.co/J8ypYaVVvC via @YouTube
ANOTHER ON E BITES THE DUST. The explosion’s cause is being investigated.

factText: The City of Houston said the last time destruction was on this level was during Hurricane Harvey.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q043

factText: Business owners get first look at damage after deadly explosion in northwest Houston https://t.co/ImalMCIcSa

factText: The quarantine in China has now extended to nearly 50 million people, as sweeping restrictions on travel are expanding daily out from the epicenter of the outbreak in the city of Wuhan.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-Accident-q006

factText: Homeowners fear the extent of the damage will keep them out of their homes forever. Officials have shut down roads leading to the site because of a throng of visitors trying to get there.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_general_Are evacuation orders still in place or have they been lifted?

factText:
Responders included 56 fire personnel — firefighters, a helicopter with paramedics, hand crews — and sheriff’s deputies.

. Emergency personnel responded when a fire broke out.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q004

factText: Cleanup process continues after deadly explosion in northwest Houston https://t.co/iUUZArxmrT via @KHOU. Recovery efforts begin after explosion in Houston damaged hundreds of homes.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q041

factText:
KHOU 11: 2 dead in massive explosion in northwest Houston.
. At least 2 people were killed in a large explosion at an industrial site in Houston early Friday morning. At least two dead in massive Houston explosion https://t.co/eRUjUxBadV https://t.co/01jxrA9rHx. 2 dead in Houston explosion that destroyed building, caused 'significant' damage to homes - ABC News -  via @ABC https://t.co/baMa8goguO. 2 killed, 20 hurt in Houston explosion https://t.co/JCiPBjKmqN via @The Manila Times
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_How many casualties have been reported due to {event}?

factText: A Department of Public Safety trooper fired at a suspected burglar near the homes impacted by the early Friday plant explosion in west Houston. Big thanks to DaddyO’s Pizza for donating pizza tonight that we were able to deliver to the Houston Police Department officers at the scene of the Houston explosion!. Houston Police Chief Art Acevedo said the suspects were not looting damaged homes near the explosion site.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_general_What actions are being taken by law enforcement to ensure safety during {event}?

factText: 2 Dead After Explosion at Houston Valve Manufacturer: The explosion happened early Friday morning inside a building at Watson Grinding and Manufacturing, which makes valves and provides thermal-spray coatings. The Deadly Houston Plant Explosion Was So Strong It Knocked People Out of Their Beds https://t.co/9OLBgJU4LR via @vice
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_What caused the explosion during {event}?

factText: Fundraisers set up for Watson Grinding explosion victims https://t.co/VgPTKypXu9
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q030

factText: https://t.co/WTv3In6vKG the Exxon Explosion In Houston, polypropylene was declared a cancer causing chemical.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_What toxic chemicals were released due to {event}?

factText: CBS affiliate KHOU reported that people across the city felt the blast and a number of nearby homes were severely damaged. Houston building explosion: Surveillance cameras capture blast, aerials show debris https://t.co/UNfNh4qdSR via @nbcnews. We recently had a large deadly explosion in Houston. An explosion at an industrial site lit up the sky in Houston, TX early Friday morning. Deadly explosion in Houston was so big it showed up on weather radar, meteorologist says
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_general_What news outlets are reporting on {event} and what are they saying?

factText: Yesterday GIC responded to a #Houston manufacturing #explosion by collecting imagery over impacted areas.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_What is the government response to {event}?

factText: NEW INFO FOR PEOPLE IMPACTED BY FRIDAY EXPLOSION:
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q005

factText: The @RedCrossTXGC Recovery Center is open.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_general_What medical services are available for affected individuals?

factText:
More than 200 homes in surrounding neighborhoods were damaged from the force of the blast that came from Watson Grinding and Manufacturing. More than 200 homes in surrounding neighborhoods were damaged as the force of the blast shattered windows, knocked down ceilings, bent garage doors and moved some homes off their foundations.

. Follow @nkhensley for updates from the homes affected by Friday's explosion in Spring Branch:
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q014

factText: Cleanup and repair efforts continued Sunday.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-Accident-q007

factText:
Houston mayor, others help residents after deadly blast: HOUSTON -- Houston’s mayor and others say they will work to provide assistance to residents whose homes were damaged after a massive explosion at a warehouse that killed two workers and injured 20 others.

. Houston’s mayor and others say they'll work to provide aid for residents whose homes were damaged after a massive explosion at a warehouse that killed two workers and injured 20 others.
